#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define s(n)	scanf("%lld",&n)
int main()
{
	long long int t;
	s(t);
	while(t--)
	{
		long long int time;
		s(time);
		long long int sec;
		s(sec);
		sec+=(time/100)*3600 + (time%100)*60;

		if(sec%86400 > (((sec+59)%86400)))
			sec=sec%86400;
		else
			sec=(((sec+59)%86400));
		long long int h,m,s;
		// sec=sec%86400;
		h=sec/3600;
		sec=sec%3600;

		// cout<<sec;
		m=(sec/60.0);
		
		cout<<h/10<<h%10<<m/10<<m%10<<endl;


	}

	return 0;
}
